techmeme.title: Menlo Ventures: business spending on generative AI hit $13.8B in 2024, up from $2.3B in 2023; OpenAI's marketshare in enterprise AI declined from 50% to 34% (Hayden Field/CNBC)
Chinese AI company DeepSeek unveils DeepSeek-R1-Lite-Preview, a "reasoning" AI model that it claims is competitive with OpenAI's o1, and plans to open source it (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Threads begins rolling out the ability to create custom feeds globally, giving users options beyond "For You" and "Following" feeds (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
Sources: Trump's team is talking with the crypto industry over whether to create a White House post dedicated to cryptocurrency policy and is vetting candidates (Bloomberg)
US prosecutors charge five alleged members of the Scattered Spider hacking group for their role in the hacks of 29+ individuals and theft of $11M+ in crypto (Margi Murphy/Bloomberg)
